title.rendered: The 2023 Nigeria – UK Migration, Justice and Home Affairs Meeting held at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Abuja

content.rendered:
The 2023 Nigeria – UK Migration, Justice and Home Affairs Meeting held at the Rotunda, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Abuja on 10th May, 2023. The Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama was represented by Amb. Akinremi Bilaji, Director (ETID), MFA.
The Meeting was Co-Chaired by Amb. Akinremi Bolaji on the Nigerian Side and Mr. Asim Hafeez, UK Home Office on the UK Side. Discussed thematic issues: Migration Management, Labour, Visa, technical assistance, investment opportunities among others.
